DeliveryAreaState.description: A contract can be available in many delivery areas, and for each delivery area it can have different opening and closing times. So for each area state, openAt and closeAt times are defined.

state.description: State of the area: HIBE, IACT ACTI. Supposed to be ACTI for a tradeable area.

openAt.description: Validity start time for contract in the area

closedAt.description: Validity close time for contract in the area

contractName.description: A more user friendly name for the contract (PH,QH,HH... etc)

state.description: State of the contract:ACTI: Active, IACT: Expired(will never be reopened), HIBE: Closed(can be reopened)

durationSeconds.description: The total duration of this contract in seconds e.g. hourly contracts have a duration of 3600 seconds.

resolutionSeconds.description: The minimum resolution of this contract in seconds e.g 15 minute resolution will be 900 seconds.

predefined.description: When a custom block order is entered, a new contract is created for that time interval if it does not already exist, in which case predefined would be false.

deleted.description: If false: update information with the contents received, If true: delete entity indicated in the message.

dlvryStart.description: The delivery start for this contract

dlvryEnd.description: The delivery end for this contract

dlvryAreaState.description: A contract can be available in many delivery areas, and for each delivery area it can have different opening and closing times. So for each area state, openAt and closeAt times are defined.

marketId.description: Id of the market that this contract belongs to, for example a code for XBID market.

mediumDisplayName.description: Medium length display name for contract

productType.description: Type of product that this contract belongs to

productId.description: Id of product that this contract belongs to

updatedAt.description: Last modification time (status change) of data
